  • Method Details

    • IsCustomerExists

      boolean IsCustomerExists(String email, String password) throws CouponSystemException
      Checks whether a customer exists in the DB
      Parameters:
      email - - customer's email
      password - - customer's password
      Returns:
      - true if customer exists, false if customer doesn't exist or if the email + password combo are incorrect.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • GetCustomerIDByEmail

      int GetCustomerIDByEmail(String email) throws CouponSystemException
      Returns a customer's ID based on email (unique)
      Parameters:
      email - customer's email
      Returns:
      customerID if customer exists, -1 if customer doesn't exist.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • IsCustomerIdExists

      boolean IsCustomerIdExists(int customerID) throws CouponSystemException
      Checks whether a customer exists in the DB
      Parameters:
      customerID - customer's id
      Returns:
      true if customer exists, false if customer doesn't exist.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      - true if succeeded, false if failed.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • GetAllCustomers

      ArrayList<Customer> GetAllCustomers() throws CouponSystemException
      Gets an ArrayList of all the customers listed in the DB
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of 'Customer' class items if succeeded, 'null' if failed or if no customers exist.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • GetOneCustomer

      Customer GetOneCustomer(int customerID) throws CouponSystemException
      Gets a customer (according to data provided in params)
      Parameters:
      customerID - a customer's ID, as listed in the DB
      Returns:
      a 'Customer' class item if succeeded, 'null' if failed or if no customer matches the requirements.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided
